mapper.select: select a.umid,a.title,a.info,a.lastupdate ,b.username 'user.username',b.nickname 'user.nickname' from tb_user_message a inner join tb_admin b on a.aid=b.aid where a.umid=#{umid}
mapper.update: update tb_user_message set title=#{title},info=#{info} where umid=#{umid} and aid=#{aid}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_user_message where umid=#{umid} and aid=#{aid}
